text: Jipeuweh-weuh treuk gopnyan le chetan Ija bak badan jimeung peubeukah Jimeung boh ija bandua gopnyan Meunalee gopnyan jimeung peuleumah Baro-barokon geutop meunalee Jinoe meuteuntee abeh dum teuhah Kheun iblih Neutham gata le Tuhan Ubak kayee nyan bek ta meulangkah Padahai boh jih meunyo tarasa Meuhat jeut gata ureueng meutuah Bandua teuh jeut keu malaikat Keukai lam teumpat churuga indah
